metadata.entity_name: Leather and Hide Tanning and Finishing

title: Leather and Hide Tanning and Finishing

industry_name.value: Leather and Hide Tanning and Finishing

cross_references.text: leather and hide tanning and finishing
cross_references.name: Leather and Hide Tanning and Finishing

description.value: This industry comprises establishments primarily engaged in one or more of the following: (1) tanning, currying, and finishing hides and skins; (2) having others process hides and skins on a contract basis; and (3) dyeing or dressing furs.

job_tasks.value: High risk job tasks associated with this industry: Generate bioaerosols derived from milk, eggs, or animal serum Use chromates or dichromates in tanning Use epoxy, isocyanate, or formaldehyde-resin adhesives, finishes, or sealants
